profile:
Full service general contractor with specialized crews offering the following services: Wheelchair accessibility conversion and designs for homes and businesses, GAF Master Elite Roofing, Certified VELUX Skylight and Sun Tunnel installation specialist, windows, doors, siding, environmentally friendly attic insulation, soffit/fascia/trough, custom bathroom renovations, commercial drywall and project management. Voted #1 contracting company in Durham Region 2009, 2010 and 2011 by Durham Business Times. Received the 2010 & 2013 Business Excellence Award of the year from the Ajax-Pickering Board of Trade. Received the City of Pickering Access Award for Disability Issues 2014. Habitat for Humanity.
For all your home repair/ renovation needs, please book an appointment with one of our qualified customer representatives. 

Some areas of expertise are: 

- Bathroom Renovation 
- Builders
- Cabinetry & Millwork 
- Chimney Build & Repair 
- Concrete Contractors 
- Condominium Renovations 
- Decks 
- Demolition 
- Design/Project Management 
- Drywall Contractors 
- Elevators, Lifts & Ramps 
- Excavation 
- Fences & Gates 
- Fire & Water Damage Restoration 
- Foundations 
- Framing 
- General Contractors 
- Green Products & Services 
- Gutters & Eavestroughs 
- Home Office Renovation 
- Insulation  
- Kitchen Planning & Renovation
- Masonry & Bricklaying 
- Renovation Advisors 
- Roofing 
- Skylights 
- Tuck Pointing 
- Waterproofing 
- Wheelchair accesibility conversion for homes or businesses.
- Windows & Doors

profile:
Specializing in Vinyl Siding, Seamless Eavestrough, Soffit, Fascia, Window & Door Capping, Windows and Doors, etc. We are a family operated business throughout 4 generations ensuring a finished product that matches your dreams. Our selection and quality of product is second to none, however our specialty in 'Heavy' gauge aluminum borders that encompass the frame of your home will separate your look from every other home in town.
Family operated since 1954, 4 generations and 80+ years of experience.
If you are looking to update your home or constructing a new build, contact ‘Holliday Home Exteriors’ for an experience that will make the process feel like you are on a holiday!!!
Michael
Phone: 647-282-3805
Email: makeitaholliday@gmail.com

profile:
People's Choice Home Improvements has been proudly serving the Durham Region for over 20 years. We specialize in the supply and installation of high quality energy efficient windows and doors. Our company works closely with our manufactures to make sure that we exceed our clients expectations by offering high quality products and exceptional workmanship. We strive to offer our services at an affordable price for every homeowners budget. We work with you on your vision of what product you want from the moment we walk through your door; style, shape, colour, glass options, etc. We take pride in not only specializing in the installation of windows and doors, but we also offer many other exceptional services such as, siding, trough/soffit/fascia, garage doors, capping, railings, porch enclosures. 

We are committed to providing you with a high level of service and satisfaction. Our goal is to leave a great impression of our services with our customers.
